title: Football Ambassadors
description: We will be honored to have one of the legends like Lionel Messi, Christiano Ronaldo, and Andres iniesta as our football ambassador. These legends are role models for children around the world and their advice and skills imparted to our students will be valuable treasure. The name of those legends are in consideration for being associated with our Academy.

title: Golf Ambassadors
description: The golf course at WON Sport Academy is spread over a lavish 200 acres site. It will be our privilege to have one of the legends like Lee Westwood, justin Rose and Ernie Els as our brand ambassador for golf. Their experience and knowledge will benefit the students since they have a rich tradition of etiquette that lives on today. The name of these great Sports persons have been shortlisted and we plan to meet them soon and request their involvement in out academy.
